short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Odoo filters by pasting a column of data from an external application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Odoo Filter Generator is designed to help Odoo users easily search a column of data from an external application such as Microsoft Excel. Whether you're an Odoo administrator, developer, or power user, this tool simplifies the process of generating accurate Odoo domain filter expressions, saving you time and reducing errors. 

This chrome extension is not affiliated or endorsed by Odoo SA or Microsoft.
